actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend section 103 of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974.

summary.text: Increases by approximately five percent the amount of financial assistance to be available to States and units of general local government for community development programs under the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 103 of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974.
